label: TradeContact
comment: A person or a department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department in a trading relationship.

datatypeProperties.comment: An accessible location specified for this trade contact.
The name, expressed as text, of the authorized person for this trade contact.
The code specifying the type of trade contact.
The name, expressed as text, of a department for this trade address.
The direct telephone communication information for this trade contact.
An instant messaging communication for this contact person.
The job title, position or designation, expressed as text, of this trade contact within an organization, such as Director, Software Engineer, Purchasing Manager.
A unique identifier for this trade contact person.
The name, expressed as text, of the person for this laboratory observation contact.
A responsibility, expressed as text, of this trade contact.
A contact person specified for this trade party.
A note specified for this photographic picture.
Telegraphy (Telex) communication information for this trade contact.
Voice Over Internet Protocol (VOIP) communication information for this trade contact.
